fullText: But far from unlocking the Harmonists’ story, Rabbi’s narration feels awkwardly grafted onto an underdeveloped narrative, an attempt at forcing deeper relevance onto a work that hasn’t otherwise earned it.

keyPhrases.quote: feels awkwardly grafted onto an underdeveloped narrative
an attempt at forcing deeper relevance onto a work that hasn't otherwise earned it
Rabbi’s narration feels awkwardly grafted onto an underdeveloped narrative

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: The critic finds fundamental flaws in the narrative structure and artificial attempts at relevance, indicating a production that fails to achieve its dramatic goals. | GPT-4o-mini: The review expresses strong criticism of the narrative structure and the effectiveness of the narration, indicating a clear negative sentiment towards the show.
